page.title: 12Canal Cruising contd.
page.content: When peoply hire the boats, they normally hire them for a week. It's normally families that hire these boats, but sometimes couples will hire them. People normally travel about 70 miles in a week, but the distance they go depends on how many locks they have to go through; on average there is one lock to every mile. When hiring a boat, the price can vary enormously according to season, e.g. 4 man boat in March - Â£125 August - Â£250 (Prices for one week). Hire includes fuel, gas, British Waterways Board licence charges, bedding and car parking. Some companies offer a discount if you hire for more than one week.
